short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrated product search and price calculation tool
short.vi: Công cụ tích hợp tìm kiếm sản phẩm và tính giá

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Custom Xmas Product Company application has a product search function and calculates prices based on the selected product type. Below is a detailed description of the application:

2. Search for products:
Users can search for products by entering keywords in the search box and pressing the "Search" button.
When the "Search" button is pressed, the application will redirect to the search results page.
3. Calculate product price:
Calculate product prices based on the selected product type.
They enter the quantity and select the product from the list.
Then, they press the "Calculator" button to see the estimated price.
Prices are calculated based on a fixed price for each product type and imported area.
4. Instructions for use and care of the product:
The pricing results also come with specific instructions on how to care for the product.
Each product type has its own care instructions to ensure durability and long-term preservation.

Custom Xmas Product Company application is a multitasking tool that helps users search for products and calculate prices conveniently. The beautiful interface and detailed product care instructions make the user experience easy and comfortable.

Contact for application comments at:
- Address: 444 Alaska Avenue, Suite #AVM879 Torrance, California 90503 USA
- Email: sales@customxmas.com
